title: How to see text messages on Verizon on my other line - Quora

response.answer_text: Metadata such as date, time, and the recipient number can usually be found on the paper bills or online statements. Text message contents are not tracked, unless done so by a third party application, where a customer would have access. Verizon legal compliance may be able to retrieve limited time frames of text details but it's typically 3-5 calendar days retention time and would require a court order or subpoena. Information can be found on the Verizon Site under Law Enforcement Request Team or LERT. The other option would be retrieving them from the phone itself.
